resources.string: "Your account has been locked down. Please contact your operator for more details."

"Your account has been locked down for the following reason:
\"%s\".
Please contact your operator for more details."
The activation email has been sent to your email address!
We have stopped playback because another application requested audio focus.
You already have the latest version
The request to launch the application has timed out!
No connection to the cast device is present
Connection to the cast device has been lost. Application is trying to re-establish the connection, if possible. Please wait for a few seconds and try again.
Receiver player has encountered a severe error
Failed to seek to the new position on the cast device
Failed to sync up with the cast device
Could not connect to the device
The application you are trying to launch is not available on your Cast device
Failed to pause the playback of media
Failed to start the playback of media
Failed to update the captions style.
Failed to stop the playback of media
This content is available in these Packages
"We're having trouble playing this channel right now, re-connecting …"

Visit facebook.com/device
on your smartphone or computer
and enter this code
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
"New! You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
An error occurred while trying to communicate with the server
No connection to the cast device exist
Connection to the cast device has been temporarily lost. Application is trying to recover connection, please try again later
Connection to the cast device is recovered
Connection to the cast device is temporarily lost
"The device has been disabled by an administrator. Please contact your operator for more details."
With your current subscription you can use up to %d devices simultaneously. Once the limit has been reached, you have to replace a previously used device to continue using the current device.
"This device has been locked down. Please contact your operator for more details."

"This device has been locked down for the following reason:
\"%s\".
Please contact your operator for more details."
The selected device has been successfully disconnected.
The device has been successfully removed
You have been automatically signed out because this device has been removed from your account.
Are you sure you want to cancel the recording of this program?
Are you sure you want to delete this DVR request?
"You can schedule recording from the Channel Guide. Once complete, the recordings will appear here to watch."
DVR Library does not contain any failed recordings
DVR Library does not contain any programs scheduled for being recorded
DVR Library does not contain any previously recorded programs
DVR Library does not contain any programs currently being recorded
Cannot record. You have reached your DVR limit.
Sorry, ran into issues performing the task you wanted
To initiate the password reset process, please follow the instructions sent to your email address.
Recording has been deleted from the DVR Library
The program will be recorded on %1$s at %2$s

"We have detected that your device's timezone is set to %1$s. The recommended timezone for your location is %2$s.
Would you like to set this timezone on your device?"
The timezone has been set to %s
The Info icon will appear throughout this video. To access details, click ENTER for info on the subject. Click the control bar Info button to turn the Info mode off.
Info Mode has been turned ON.
An error occurred while trying to parse server response
Media controls hidden, press d-pad to show
DVR Library is only accessible to logged in users
Log In Using Username and Password
Could not retrieve email address from Facebook
Are you sure you want to log out?
Logging out will remove the current device from your account. Once removed, you will have to re-authenticate to continue using it.
DVR module is not available on this device
No application can handle this request.
We are sorry, but no recent episodes are currently available
Make sure your network settings are correct, depending on the type of connection you have. Once the issue is fixed, press the Retry button to continue.
No network root category was set, networks cannot be loaded
No network connection has been detected
We are sorry, but no popular content could be retrieved at this moment
Could not find a valid video source stream URL in server response
We are sorry, but no videos are available in this category
An internal server error occurred while retrieving data from the server.
A network error occurred while retrieving data from the server.
Could not find a valid source stream for playing back this channel on this device.
We paused your stream because no one was watching, would you like to start watching again?
The currently running program is a Pay Per View program, which requires a valid ticket
Premium content requires a valid subscription
"Don't have an account? Register one here"
Your account has been successfully created. Please check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
Once removed, you will have to re-authenticate to continue using it.
You will have to re-authenticate on that device to continue using it.
This is your only primary device, it is not recommended to remove it as you will lose access to some premium channels.
The device will be disconnected and you will not be able to use that device while the current device is in use. You have the option to upgrade if you want to use more devices simultaneously.
"Your account is not active. Please check your email for instructions on how to activate your account. Do you want to resend the activation email?"
Could not launch Sling channel: no installed application can handle this request.
An error occurred during execution of the speed test. Please try again later.
An error occurred while trying to initialise the speed test
You have to be logged in to be able to send test results. Please login first and retry.
The test results have been successfully sent to your registered email address.
If you are a REGISTERED %s MEMBER, please login.
If you are NEW to %s, please register for an account below.
You can purchase a subscription for this channel by pressing the button below.

Your %1$s trial account has expired.

Visit %2$s to purchase a subscription
"or log in here if you already purchased."
"or check your account details if you already purchased."
Could not launch TV Everywhere channel: no installed application can handle this request.

Allow %1$s to access the email address associated with your Twitter account @%2$s so that %1$s can use it according to its privacy policy. For example, %1$s could send you updates and other information at that address.
Automatically setting the timezone is not supported on this device. Please update the timezone manually from your device settings.
The value is not a valid email address

This will send you to %1$s website.
Mobile users may buy this at %2$s
"No results found. Please try again using another search query."
"We're having trouble playing this video right now, re-connecting …"

Premium content requires a valid subscription.
Please visit %1$s to purchase.
